start:
Hello, This bot is a Pixiv helper, You can send me Pixiv link and I'll send illust / manga / ugoira to you.

Maintainer: @makeding
illust_404: Work has been deleted or the ID does not exist.
file_too_large: File too large so bot can't send orininal file to you, try download manually.
telegraph_ugoira: Due to Telegraph restrictions, ugoira can't be uploaded in Telegraph, so ugoira(s) are not included in Telegraph.
